name: locationManager(_:didRangeBeacons:in:)
desc: Tells the delegate that one or more beacons are in range.DeprecatedUse locationManager(_:didRange:satisfying:) instead.
declaration:
optional func locationManager(_ manager: CLLocationManager, 
              didRangeBeacons beacons: [CLBeacon], 
                           in region: CLBeaconRegion)
